name: GrappleUP
description:
Get ready to swing and sling all around in this game! In order to reach all the way UP you need to master the grappling gun.(Good luck with that!)

The modifications in the game are:

  • Main Menu and UI
  • 2D platformer
  • Custom art design
  • Grappling Gun

Credits 

Created by - Dhiraj Makhijani

Music from MixKit.
